eolActor Struct Reference

eolFloat frameRate
eolInt frameDirection

Detailed Description

the purpose of an actor type is to provide a specific instance of an animated model. Actors might be used by entities, particles or UI unlike other resources, the actor is not meant to be allocated or de-allocated.
